name: UpdateUserHandoffNotification
description:
Update a user's handoff notification rule in PagerDuty.

This tool updates a user's handoff notification rule in a PagerDuty account. It should be called when changes to a user's notification preferences are needed, such as updating contact methods or schedules for handoff alerts. Requires `users.write` scope in OAuth.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the resource to be updated, representing the user in PagerDuty.

parameters.name: handoff_notification_rule_id
parameters.description: The ID of the oncall handoff notification rule to update for the user.

value_schema.description: The oncall handoff notification rule ID on the user.

parameters.name: versioning_accept_header
parameters.description: A string to specify the API version using the 'Accept' header for version control.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the request body, typically set to 'application/json'.

parameters.name: updated_handoff_notification_rule
parameters.description: JSON object containing updated details for the user's handoff notification rule, including delay in minutes, handoff type, and contact method.

notify_advance_in_minutes.description: The delay before firing the rule, in minutes.

handoff_type.description: The type of handoff being created.

oncall_handoff_notification_rule.description: A rule for contacting the user for Handoff Notifications.

value_schema.description: The User's Handoff Notification Rule to be updated.
